Verses: 1 sorndhupogaamal Eppozhudhum Jebampannavendum Enbadhaik Kuriththu Avargalukku Avar Oru Uvamaiyaich Sonnaar.
2 oru Pattanaththile Oru Niyaayaadhibadhi Irundhaan; Avan Dhevanukkup Bayappadaadhavanum Manusharai Madhiyaadhavanumaayirundhaan.
3 andhap Pattanaththile Oru Vidhavaiyum Irundhaal; Aval Avanidaththilpoi: Enakkum En Edhiraalikkum Irukkira Kaariyaththil Enakku Niyaayanjeyyavendum Endru Vinnappampanninaal.
4 vegunaal Varaikkum Avanukku Manadhillaadhirundhadhu. Pinbu Avan Naan Dhevanukkup Bayappadaamalum Manusharai Madhiyaamalum Irundhum,
5 indha Vidhavai Ennai Eppozhudhum Thondharavu Seygirabadiyinaal, Ival Adikkadi Vandhu Ennai Alattaadhabadi Ivalukku Niyaayanjeyyavendumendru Thanakkulle Sollikkondaan Endraar.
6 pinnum Karththar Avargalai Nokki: Aneedhiyulla Andha Niyaayaadhibadhi Sonnadhaich Sindhiththuppaarungal.

7 andhapbadiye Dhevan Thammai Nokki Iravum Pagalum Kooppidugiravargalaagiya Thammaal Therindhukollappattavargalin Vishayaththil Neediya Porumaiyullavaraayirundhu Avargalukku Niyaayanjeyyaamaliruppaaro?
8 seekkiraththile Avargalukku Niyaayanjeyvaarendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren. Aagilum Manushakumaaran Varumbodhu Boomiyile Visuvaasaththaik Kaanbaaro Endraar.
9 andriyum, Thangalai Needhimaangalendru Nambi, Matravargalai Arpamaayennina Silaraikkuriththu, Avar Oru Uvamaiyaich Sonnaar.
10 irandu Manushar Jebampannumbadi Dhevaalayaththukkup Ponaargal; Oruvan Pariseyan, Matravan Aayakkaaran.
11 pariseyan Nindru; Dhevane! Naan Parikaarar, Aniyaayakkaarar, Vibasaarakkaarar Aagiya Matra Manusharaippolavum, Indha Aayakkaaranaippolavum Iraadhadhanaal Ummai Sthoththirikkiren.
12 vaaraththil Irandudharam Ubavaasikkiren; En Sambaaththiyaththilellaam Dhasamabaagam Seluththivarugiren Endru, Thanakkulle Jebampanninaan.
13 aayakkaaran Thooraththile Nindru, Than Kangalaiyum Vaanaththukku Eredukkath Thuniyaamal, Than Maarbile Adiththukkondu; Dhevane! Paaviyaagiya Enmel Kirubaiyaayirum Endraan.

14 avanalla, Ivane Needhimaanaakkappattavanaaith Than Veettukkuth Thirumbipponaan Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren; Enenil Thannai Uyarththugiravanevanum Thaazhththappaduvaan, Thannaith Thaazhththugiravan Uyarththappaduvaan Endraar.
15 pinbu Kuzhandhaigalaiyum Avar Thodumpadikku Avargalai Avaridaththil Konduvandhaargal. Seeshargal Adhaikkandu, Konduvandhavargalai Adhattinaargal.
16 yesuvo Avaigalaik Konduvarumpadi Kattalaiyittu: Siru Pillaigal Ennidaththil Varugiradharku Idankodungal, Avaigalaith Thadaipannaadhirungal; Dhevanudaiya Raajyam Appadippattavargaludaiyadhu;
17 evanaagilum Sirupillaiyaippol Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththai Etrukkollaavittaal, Adhil Piravesikkamaattaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
18 appozhudhu Thalaivan Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Nalla Podhagare, Niththiya Jeevanaich Sudhandhariththukkolvadharku Naan Enna Seyyavendum Endru Kettaan.
19 adharku Yesu: Nee Ennai Nallavanendru Solvaanen? Dhevan Oruvar Thavira Nallavan Oruvanum Illaiye.

20 vipasaaranj Seyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kolaiseyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Kalavuseyyaadhiruppaayaaga, Poichsaatchi Sollaadhiruppaayaaga, Un Thagappanaiyum Un Thaayaiyum Kanampannuvaayaaga Engira Karpanaigalai Nee Arindhirukkiraaye Endraar.
21 adharku Avan Ivaigalaiyellaam En Siru Vayadhumudhal Kaikkondirukkiren Endraan.

22 yesu Adhaik Kettu: Innum Unnidaththil Oru Kuraivu Undu; Unakku Undaanavaigalaiyellaam Vitruth Thariththirarukkuk Kodu Appozhudhu Paralogaththile Unakkup Pokkisham Undaayirukkum; Pinbu Ennaip Pinpatrivaa Endraar.
23 avan Adhiga Aisuvariyamullavanaanapadiyinaal, Idhaik Kettapozhudhu, Migundha Dhukkamadaindhaan.
24 avan Migundha Dhukkamadaindhadhai Yesu Kandu: Aisuvariyamullavargal Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesippadhu Evvalavu Aridhaayirukkiradhu.
25 aisuvariyavaan Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththil Piravesippadhaippaarkkilum, Ottagamaanadhu Oosiyin Kaadhile Nuzhaivadhu Elidhaayirukkum Endraar.
26 adhaik Kettavargal: Appadiyaanaal Yaar Ratchikkappadakkoodum Endraargal.
27 adharku Avar: Manusharaal Koodaadhavaigal Dhevanaal Koodum Endraar.
28 appozhudhu Pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Idho, Naangal Ellaavatraiyum Vittu, Ummaip Pinpatrinome Endraan.
29 adharku Avar: Dhevanudaiya Raajyaththinimiththam Veettaiyaavadhu, Petraaraiyaavadhu, Sagodhararaiyaavadhu, Manaiviyaiyaavadhu, Pillaigalaiyaavadhu Vittuvittavan Evanum,
30 immaiyile Adhigamaanavaigalaiyum, Marumaiyile Niththiya Jeevanaiyum Adaiyaamarpovadhillaiyendru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
31 pinbu Avar Panniruvaraiyum Thammidaththil Azhaiththu: Idho, Erusalemukkup Pogirom, Manushakumaaranaik Kuriththuth Theerkkadharisigalaal Ezhudhappattavaigalellaam Niraiverum.
32 eppadiyenil, Avar Purajaadhiyaaridaththil Oppukkodukkappattu, Pariyaasamum Nindhaiyum Adaindhu, Thuppappaduvaar.
33 avarai Vaarinaal Adiththu, Kolai Seyvaargal; Moondraam Naalile Avar Uyirode Ezhundhiruppaar Endraar.
34 ivaigalil Ondraiyum Avargal Unaravillai; Avaigalin Porul Avargalukku Maraivaayirundhadhu, Avar Sonnavaigalai Avargal Arindhukollavillai.
35 pinbu Avar Erigovukkuch Sameebamaai Varumpodhu, Oru Kurudan Vazhiyaruge Utkaarndhu Pichchaikettukkondirundhaan.
36 janangal Nadakkira Saththaththai Avan Kettu, Idhenna Endru Visaariththaan.
37 nasareyanaagiya Yesu Pogiraar Endru Avanukku Ariviththaargal. Appozhudhu Avan Yesuve, Dhaaveedhin Kumaarane, Enakku Irangum Endru Kooppittaan.
38 mun Nadappavargal Avan Pesaamalirukkumpadi Avanai Adhattinaargal. Avano: Dhaaveedhin Kumaarane, Enakku Irangum Endru Migavum Adhigamaaik Kooppittaan.
39 yesu Nindru, Avanaith Thammidaththil Konduvarumpadi Sonnaar.
40 avan Kittavandhapodhu, Avar Avanai Nokki:
41 naan Unakku Ennaseyyavendum Endrirukkiraai Endru Kettaar. Adharku Avan: Aandavare, Naan Paarvaiyadaiyavendum Endraan.
42 yesu Avanai Nokki: Nee Paarvaiyadaivaayaaga, Un Visuvaasam Unnai Ratchiththadhu Endraar.
43 udane Avan Paarvaiyadaindhu, Dhevanai Magimaippaduththikkonde, Avarukkup Pinsendraan. Janangalellaarum Adhaik Kandu, Dhevanaip Pugazhndhaargal.
